summary: Hanoi is Vietnam's capital and second-largest city, located between the Red and Black Rivers. It has a rich history, dating back to the third century BCE. The city has changed names and rulers over the centuries, from ancient Vietnamese empires to French colonial rule. Today, Hanoi is a bustling cultural and economic hub with many attractions, like the Imperial Citadel of ThÄƒng Long and Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum. It's also home to many foreign embassies and governmental organizations. The city's architecture is diverse, reflecting its historical influences and rapid growth.
title: Hanoi
